name: Darkrai GX
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Restoration
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is in your discard pile, you may put it onto your Bench. Then, attach a {D} Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dark Cleave
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Dead End GX
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, that Pokémon is Knocked Out. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
